did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Simone Guillessen-Hoa Papers must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Simone Guillessen-Hoa Papers, Ms 2001-024, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The Simone Guillessen-Hoa Papers were added to the IAWA Small Collections Ms2009-054 in September 2009.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Simone Guillessen-Hoa collection consists photographs of Guillessen-Hoa taken in 1987 and a biographical sketch, following her career from 1947-1987.
